articles.description: Sergio Aguero's Man City departure has been confirmed and it is now a case of where he goes with clubs in Europe, America and South America all linked with his signature
articles.title: 5 potential destinations for Sergio Aguero after Man City exit confirmed - Mirror Online

articles.description: Canada's National Advisory Committee on Immunization has recommended pausing administration of the AstraZeneca coronavirus vaccine to those under the age of 55 due to reports of blood clots occurring in vaccine recipients in Europe.
articles.title: The AstraZeneca vaccine, blood clots and VIPIT: What you need to know - CTV News
